references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many point cloud-based deep learning models, introducing the PointNet architecture which directly processes point cloud data without requiring explicit voxelization or other intermediate representations.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: This work extends the PointNet architecture by introducing a hierarchical structure, enabling the processing of large-scale point clouds and improving the accuracy of feature extraction.

This paper introduces the Point Cloud Transformer (PCT), which is one of the first to apply transformer architectures to point cloud data processing, significantly advancing the state-of-the-art in various tasks.
This paper focuses on improving the robustness of point cloud classifiers against real-world corruptions, providing essential context for the current work, which also addresses this issue.

references.paper_title: PointNext: Revisiting pointnet++ with improved training and scaling strategies
references.reason: This paper presents an improved and more efficient version of PointNet++, serving as a significant advancement in point cloud feature extraction and demonstrating state-of-the-art performance in various downstream tasks.
